orig_text: The only exception is if a discovery session (see Section 2.3 iSCSI Session Types) is to be established.
correct_text: The only exception is if a discovery session (see Section 3.3 iSCSI Session Types) is to be established.

notes:
The test data is correct but the description is wrong.
